name: Dreamer (itch) (CallumPorter)
description:
My first game jam project.

Escape the nightmare as you try to fall deeper and deeper into sleep. But be careful! The faster you fall the harder it is to control. Defeat the dream sheep to increase your multiplier and get a higher score. Submit your highscores to the active leaderboards.

Controls

A/D = Left/Right
S = Speed Boost
W = Slow Down 
S, quickly followed by W = Quick boost upwards
Space = Attack

The sheep in the top left indiciate the amount needed to increase your multiplier.
